content: अभिशस्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Charged, falsely accused, calumniated, abused, insulted; <ls>Ms. 8. 116</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">373</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 161.</ls> {@--2@} Hurt, injured, attacked (supposed to be from अभिशस्); देवि केनाभिशस्तासि केन वासि विमानिता <ls>Rām.</ls>; <ls>Ms. 11. 113</ls> threatened. {@--3@} Cursed (for अभिशप्त). {@--4@} Wicked, sinful, infamous. --स्तं = अभशस्ति <ab>q. v.</ab>
